description: LOWER PRICE just for the start of football season! TV Backlight Kit from Inspired LED can reduce eye strain by providing bias lighting. Our TV Backlight will provide enough light for your eyes to get their color reference, and you will find that the picture may seem crisper, and the colors more vivid. This kit comes with a 36" long flexible LED strip with 28 LEDs, 1 power supply, 1 switch, 1 interconnect cable, and cable clamps - -everything you need to install in minutes!
title: LED Backlight Kit for 46-57 inches TV LCD Flatscreen (Table Mount)
